__note__: This is file is autogenerated, do not edit it manually. For more info https://data.aoe4world.com/

data.name: Abbey of Kings
data.description: Heals all nearby friendly units that are out of combat by +6 every 1 seconds. May also Crown a King, a powerful cavalry leader with a healing aura. Queues production of a free King upon completion.

variations.name: Abbey of Kings
variations.description: Heals all nearby friendly units that are out of combat by +6 every 1 seconds. May also Crown a King, a powerful cavalry leader with a healing aura. Queues production of a free King upon completion.
variations.descriptionCN: 治疗附近所有脱离战斗的友方单位，每 1 秒恢复其 +6 生命值。也可以加冕一位国王，一位带有治疗光环的强大骑兵领袖。完成后自动生产一个免费国王。

data.name: Archery Range
data.description: Produces ranged infantry units.

variations.name: Archery Range
variations.description: Produces ranged infantry units.
variations.descriptionCN: 生产远程步兵单位。

data.name: Barracks
data.description: Produces melee infantry units.

variations.name: Barracks
variations.description: Produces melee infantry units.
variations.descriptionCN: 生产近战步兵单位。

data.name: Berkshire Palace
data.description: Acts as a Keep with increased health and powerful incendiary arrows. All weapons have 14.5 tiles of range.

variations.name: Berkshire Palace
variations.description: Acts as a Keep with increased health and powerful incendiary arrows. All weapons have 14.5 tiles of range.
variations.descriptionCN: 作为一个城堡使用，拥有增加的生命值和强大的燃烧箭。所有武器都有 14.5 格的射程。

data.name: Blacksmith
data.description: Houses technology to improve infantry and cavalry.

variations.name: Blacksmith
variations.description: Houses technology to improve infantry and cavalry.
variations.descriptionCN: 可研究强化步兵和骑兵的科技。

data.name: Capital Town Center
data.description:
All Resources can be dropped off here. Produces Villagers, Scouts, and increases your maximum Population. Adds additional attacks while garrisoned.
Network of Castles: Nearby enemies trigger an alarm that increases defenders' attack speed.
Capital Town Centers can detect units stealth or disguises.

variations.name: Capital Town Center
variations.description:
All Resources can be dropped off here. Produces Villagers, Scouts, and increases your maximum Population. Adds additional attacks while garrisoned.
Network of Castles: Nearby enemies trigger an alarm that increases defenders' attack speed.
Capital Town Centers can detect units stealth or disguises.
variations.descriptionCN:
可在此存放所有资源。可生产村民、侦察兵，并提高人口上限。单位驻扎时可增加额外的攻击次数。
城堡网络：附近的敌人会触发警报，从而加快守军的攻击速度。
首都城镇中心可侦测匿踪或伪装单位。

data.name: Cathedral of St. Thomas
data.description: Build and defend a Wonder to secure victory. Rival civilizations will be aware of its construction and seek to destroy it.

variations.name: Cathedral of St. Thomas
variations.description: Build and defend a Wonder to secure victory. Rival civilizations will be aware of its construction and seek to destroy it.
variations.descriptionCN: 建造并守护世界奇观可以获得胜利。敌方文明会察觉并设法摧毁你的世界奇观。

data.name: Council Hall
data.description:
Acts as an Archery Range with all units and technologies. Works +100% faster.
Longbowmen produced from this landmark are -5% cheaper.

variations.name: Council Hall
variations.description:
Acts as an Archery Range with all units and technologies. Works +100% faster.
Longbowmen produced from this landmark are -5% cheaper.
variations.descriptionCN:
可作为所有单位和科技的靶场使用。工作速度 +100%。
由此地标生产的长弓兵成本 -5%。

data.name: Dock
data.description:
Produces naval units.
Automatically repairs nearby damaged naval units.
Capable of holding up to three Fishing Ships.

variations.name: Dock
variations.description:
Produces naval units.
Automatically repairs nearby damaged naval units.
Capable of holding up to three Fishing Ships.
variations.descriptionCN:
生产海军单位。
自动修理附近受损的海军单位。
最多可容纳三艘渔船。
displayClassesCN: 军事和经济建筑、交易站

data.name: Farm
data.description:
Harvestable Food source. Use a Villager to gather Food from the Farm.
Only one Villager can work each Farm.

variations.name: Farm
variations.description:
Harvestable Food source. Use a Villager to gather Food from the Farm.
Only one Villager can work each Farm.
variations.descriptionCN:
可采集的食物来源，利用村民即可从农田采集食物。
每块农田只能派遣一位村民耕作。
influences: Farm harvest rate increased +20%/+25%/+30%/+30% by Age while within the influence of a Mill.
influencesCN: 随着时代提升，磨坊影响范围之内的农田采集速率 +20%/+25%/+30%/+30%。

data.name: House
data.description: Increases your maximum Population.

variations.name: House
variations.description: Increases your maximum Population.
variations.descriptionCN: 提升您的人口上限。

data.name: Keep
data.description:
Heavy garrison and defensible position. Can be upgraded with weaponry. Adds additional attacks while garrisoned.
Network of Castles Bonus: Triggers an alarm when an enemy approaches, causing nearby units to fire faster while the alarm is active.

variations.name: Keep
variations.description:
Heavy garrison and defensible position. Can be upgraded with weaponry. Adds additional attacks while garrisoned.
Network of Castles Bonus: Triggers an alarm when an enemy approaches, causing nearby units to fire faster while the alarm is active.
variations.descriptionCN:
坚实的驻军及防御地点。可进行武器升级。单位驻扎时可增加额外的攻击次数。
城堡网络加成：敌人接近时会触发警报，警报生效期间附近的单位射击速度会加快。

data.name: King's Palace
data.description: Acts as a Town Center with all the behaviors, technology, units, and bonuses.

variations.name: King's Palace
variations.description: Acts as a Town Center with all the behaviors, technology, units, and bonuses.
variations.descriptionCN: 可作为城镇中心使用，具备其所有功能、科技、单位以及加成。

data.name: Lumber Camp
data.description: Villagers can drop off Wood at this building. Houses technologies to improve Wood gathering.

variations.name: Lumber Camp
variations.description: Villagers can drop off Wood at this building. Houses technologies to improve Wood gathering.
variations.descriptionCN: 村民可将木材存放于这座建筑。可研究提升木材采集效率的科技。

data.name: Market
data.description: Allows the buying and selling of resources and produces the Trader.

variations.name: Market
variations.description: Allows the buying and selling of resources and produces the Trader.
variations.descriptionCN: 可生产商人及买卖资源。

data.name: Mill
data.description: Villagers can drop off Food at this building. Houses technologies to improve Food gathering.

variations.name: Mill
variations.description: Villagers can drop off Food at this building. Houses technologies to improve Food gathering.
variations.descriptionCN: 村民可将食物存放于这座建筑。可研究提升食物采集效率的科技。
influences: Farm harvest rate increased +20%/+25%/+30%/+30% by Age while within the influence of a Mill.
influencesCN: 随着时代提升，磨坊影响范围之内的农田采集速率 +20%/+25%/+30%/+30%。

data.name: Mining Camp
data.description: Villagers can drop off Stone and Gold at this building. Houses technologies to improve mining.

variations.name: Mining Camp
variations.description: Villagers can drop off Stone and Gold at this building. Houses technologies to improve mining.
variations.descriptionCN: 村民可将石料和黄金存放于这座建筑。可研究提升采矿效率的科技。

data.name: Monastery
data.description: Produces religious units and houses religious technologies. Starting in the Castle Age (III), religious units can pick up Relics and place them in this building to generate Gold.

variations.name: Monastery
variations.description: Produces religious units and houses religious technologies. Starting in the Castle Age (III), religious units can pick up Relics and place them in this building to generate Gold.
variations.descriptionCN: 生产宗教单位并可研究宗教科技。从城堡时代 (第三时代) 开始，宗教单位可拾取圣物并将其放置在此建筑中以产生黄金。

data.name: Outpost
data.description:
Offers extensive line of sight and detects units stealth or disguises. Can be upgraded with weaponry and fortifications. Attacks while garrisoned.
Network of Castles Bonus: Triggers an alarm when an enemy approaches, causing nearby units and defensive buildings to fire faster while the alarm is active.

variations.name: Outpost
variations.description:
Offers extensive line of sight and detects units stealth or disguises. Can be upgraded with weaponry and fortifications. Attacks while garrisoned.
Network of Castles Bonus: Triggers an alarm when an enemy approaches, causing nearby units and defensive buildings to fire faster while the alarm is active.
variations.descriptionCN:
可提供开阔的视野，侦测匿踪或伪装单位。可以升级武器和防御工事。单位驻扎时可进行攻击。
城堡网络加成：敌人接近时会触发警报，警报生效期间附近的单位和防御型建筑射击速度会加快。

data.name: Palisade
data.description:
Light defensive wall for quickly fortifying an area.
Initially costs 21 Wood, with each additional section costing 7 Wood.

variations.name: Palisade
variations.description:
Light defensive wall for quickly fortifying an area.
Initially costs 21 Wood, with each additional section costing 7 Wood.
variations.descriptionCN:
轻型的防御城墙，可快速为区域设防。
最初花费 21 木材，每增加一段则花费 7 木材。

data.name: Palisade Gate
data.description: Light defensive gate. Must be built on a Palisade Wall segment.

variations.name: Palisade Gate
variations.description: Light defensive gate. Must be built on a Palisade Wall segment.
variations.descriptionCN: 轻型防御城门。必须建造在木栅栏上。

data.name: Siege Workshop
data.description: Produces siege engines and powerful gunpowder units.

variations.name: Siege Workshop
variations.description: Produces siege engines and powerful gunpowder units.
variations.descriptionCN: 生产攻城器械和强大的火药单位。

data.name: Stable
data.description: Produces cavalry military units.

variations.name: Stable
variations.description: Produces cavalry military units.
variations.descriptionCN: 生产骑兵军事单位。

data.name: Stone Wall
data.description:
Sturdy wall that cannot be attacked by torches. 
Units on walls take 25% less damage from ranged attacks, 50% less damage from siege attacks, and their range is increased by +1.

variations.name: Stone Wall
variations.description:
Sturdy wall that cannot be attacked by torches. 
Units on walls take 25% less damage from ranged attacks, 50% less damage from siege attacks, and their range is increased by +1.
variations.descriptionCN:
坚固的城墙，火把无法攻击。
城墙上的单位受到远程攻击的伤害 -25%，攻城攻击的伤害 -50%，并且它们的射程 +1。

data.name: Stone Wall Gate
data.description:
Heavy defensive gate. Must be built on a Stone Wall segment.
Infantry can use the gate to access the top of the walls.

variations.name: Stone Wall Gate
variations.description:
Heavy defensive gate. Must be built on a Stone Wall segment.
Infantry can use the gate to access the top of the walls.
variations.descriptionCN:
重型防御城门。必须建于石墙上。
步兵可利用城门前往城墙顶端。

data.name: Stone Wall Tower
data.description:
Heavy defensive tower that fires a springald. Must be built on a Stone Wall segment.
Infantry can use the tower to access the top of the walls.
Network of Castles: Nearby enemies trigger an alarm that increases defenders' fire rate.

variations.name: Stone Wall Tower
variations.description:
Heavy defensive tower that fires a springald. Must be built on a Stone Wall segment.
Infantry can use the tower to access the top of the walls.
Network of Castles: Nearby enemies trigger an alarm that increases defenders' fire rate.
variations.descriptionCN:
防御坚实的箭塔，会发射扭力弩炮。必须建于石墙上。
步兵可利用箭塔前往石墙顶端。
城堡网络：附近敌人会触发警报，从而加快守军的射击速度。

data.name: The White Tower
data.description: Acts as a Keep with all the behaviors, technologies, and bonuses. Works 75% faster.

variations.name: The White Tower
variations.description: Acts as a Keep with all the behaviors, technologies, and bonuses. Works 75% faster.
variations.descriptionCN: 可作为城堡使用，具备其所有功能、科技以及加成。工作速度提高 75%。

data.name: Town Center
data.description:
All Resources can be dropped off here. Produces Villagers, Scouts, and increases your Population. Adds additional attacks while garrisoned.
Network of Castles: Nearby enemies trigger an alarm that increases defenders' attack speed.
Non-Capital Town Centers can't detect stealth or disguises.

variations.name: Town Center
variations.description:
All Resources can be dropped off here. Produces Villagers, Scouts, and increases your Population. Adds additional attacks while garrisoned.
Network of Castles: Nearby enemies trigger an alarm that increases defenders' attack speed.
Non-Capital Town Centers can't detect stealth or disguises.
variations.descriptionCN:
可在此存放所有资源。可生产村民、侦察兵，并增加人口。单位驻扎时可增加额外的攻击次数。
城堡网络：附近的敌人会触发警报，从而加快守军的攻击速度。
非首都城镇中心无法侦测匿踪或伪装。

data.name: University
data.description: Houses advanced technology that benefit the civilization.

variations.name: University
variations.description: Houses advanced technology that benefit the civilization.
variations.descriptionCN: 可研究对整个文明有益的先进科技。

data.name: Wynguard Palace
data.description: Allows production of 4 battalions: Wynguard Army, Wynguard Rangers, Wynguard Raiders, and Wynguard Footmen.

variations.name: Wynguard Palace
variations.description: Allows production of 4 battalions: Wynguard Army, Wynguard Rangers, Wynguard Raiders, and Wynguard Footmen.
variations.descriptionCN: 可以生产 4 个营队：温嘉德军队、温嘉德长弓兵、温嘉德掠夺者和温嘉德步兵。
